text: Ingaba iindaba azifikanga na kuni, ezabo babengaphambili kunani, abantu bakwaNûh Nabakwa’Ad nabakwaThamûd? Nabo basemva kwabo? Akukho namnye obaziyo ngaphandle koAllâh. Kubo kweza abaProfeti babo benemiqondiso ecacileyo, kodwa babeka izandla zabo emilonyeni yabo, bathi: “Inene thina asikholwa koko nina nikuthunyiweyo yaye sikuthandabuza ngamandla oko nisimemela kuko nina (kuyi-Islam).”
